title: SKT T1 WINS THE LCS

replies.body:
Meh sick of skt winning and everyone praising faker just because he's faker I mean he legitimately fed his ass off today (apart from the ryze game) yet the commentators praise him as a god.

Anyway I'm just happy that SSG managed to prove everyone wrong, they didn't get completely stomped. This was probably one of the most fun finals to watch.

Even though faker fed, he did a lot of things to contribute to the win. It's hard to explain, you can feed but do other things that can help you guys win. I was feeding 0/3 with jinx and since no one in the enemy team really minded me because I was feeding, I ended up pushing bot lane to the inhib which made the enemy team B to base and was free baron for us.

__> [{quoted}](name=iAkeno,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=V1zlxFmj,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-30T22:30:33.444+0000)
>
> Even though faker fed, he did a lot of things to contribute to the win. It's hard to explain, you can feed but do other things that can help you guys win. I was feeding 0/3 with jinx and since no one in the enemy team really minded me because I was feeding, I ended up pushing bot lane to the inhib which made the enemy team B to base and was free baron for us.

Still, I feel like he's a point he will take a Cs and the commentators will be all 'OMG NO WAY, FAKER JUST TOOK A CANNON MINION. THE MID LAANER FOR SKT CARRYING HIS TEAM THROUGH TO THE FINALS'

I mean that was a bit of an exaggeration but yesterday the commentators and audience literally were cheering him on because he.... revived. And I'm just there like 'Wtf that's not a good thing that means he died lmao'.

Oh yeah that's true. The commentators are like sucking his dick or something. He is like the stephen curry of league of legends. He is a good player but when he does something it's something that no one has seen in their life

So Faker died 16 times across 5 games. He was 28% of the the teams deaths across those 5 games. He was heavily targeted in each game and Ambition had some amazing kicks on Lee to get Faker destroyed. I wouldn't go as far as saying he fed. 

It was a great series and like you say SSG were more competitive than people thought they would be.

Now let us wait for all the SSG noob fans to come and cry {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 

Booo to them SKT FOREVER {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

SKT FOREVER


...and all of my finals picks were right PogChamp
